title: Payment calculator
description: Penthouse 6JK offers true loft living on the top floor in the heart of Chelsea. This apartment is the whole length of the building on the north side, with over 50 feet of skylights and 9 windows facing East  &  North, allowing tons of light into this spacious home. The expansive living room with 15-foot ceilings, exposed brick and natural light from oversized skylights  &  windows showcases iconic views of London Terrace. The kitchen is complete with all white appliances, white spacious countertops that flow into a dining area perfect for entertaining. Four bedrooms and Two full bathrooms with the primary bedroom having a walk-in closet . Washer/dryer in unit  410 West 23rd Street is a charming, non-smoking, elevator building that includes a virtual doorman intercom which allows for buzzing in guests or deliveries, a central laundry room, bike racks, and a live-in super. The lobby and hallway renovations were completed in February. Pets, Pied-a-terre, and co-purchasing are all permitted. Subletting is permitted after two (2) years with board approval. With the High Line, amazing restaurants, vibrant arts scene, Chelsea Piers and Hudson River Park all just around the corner. Nearby transportation includes the C, E  &  1 subways and the Select 23rd Street crosstown bus or 9th Avenue Limited.
